Adhd.name: Adhd
Adhd.description: ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder) is a neurodevelopmental condition characterized by inattention, hyperactivity, and impulsivity.

Autism.name: Autism
Autism.description: Autism is a neurodevelopmental condition that affects communication, behavior, and social interaction.

Neurodivergent.name: Neurodivergent
Neurodivergent.description: Neurodivergent is an umbrella term for people whose neurological development is atypical, including autism, ADHD, dyslexia, and others.
